Important Update from the Superintendent of Schools - Update #12

h3.a: Important Update from the Superintendent of Schools - Update #12

div.p: April 8, 2020 Dear Parents and Guardians, Although it has only been a few days since the last letter from the District, it has been a busy few days. This update is being provided before the long...
Due to the COVID-19 school closure, the Pre-K lottery registration deadline has been extended to a date as yet to be determined. BPS registration continues to be open for all Pre-K through 12...
Please see the District's News Section for the updated 2019-2020 School Year Calendar.
Please see the District's News Section for an important update from Superintendent Hernandez.

The Branford Public Schools District is committed to ensuring accessibility of its website for students, parents, and members of the community with disabilities. Our intention is that all pages on the Branford Public Schools website conform to the W3C Web Accessibility Initiative’s (WAI) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level AA conformance, or updated equivalents of these guidelines.
If you have questions or concerns about the website and its accessibility, please contact bpswebmaster@branfordschools.org.

p.strong: Free meals are available to all children 18 and under. These include breakfast and hot lunch Monday - Friday as well as breakfast packs distributed every Friday for the weekend.
